reviewText: Picture and sound un-professional. It is more like a camcorder rendition. Have been to Tahiti 6 times and love Tahtian dancing and music. Have seen great vidoes of such and hoped this was one of them. I am sorely  disapointed. The 5 star review was misleading

This video captures the energy and electricity of a Tahitian dance competition, lots of color, pulsing drumbeats, gorgeous dancers.  I'd recommend it for anyone who has an interest in Polynesia or ethnic dance.
